devdoc.details: Allows Hub-admin to add and remove Job posters and allows Job posters to request access

approvePoster(address).details: Allows admin to approve job posters who request access

checkPosterAccess(address).details: Allows anyone to check a poster's access credentials
checkPosterAccess(address).return: uint value that indicates poster's access type

deletePoster(address).details: Allows admin delete an already approved job poster

fetchApprovedPoster(uint256).details: Allows admin to fetch an approved posters addr using idx
fetchApprovedPoster(uint256).return: address of the approved poster at the given idx

fetchApprovedPosterNum().details: Allows admin to fetch the number of approved
fetchApprovedPosterNum().return: length of array of approved posters

fetchPendingPoster(uint256).details: Allows admin to fetch the addr posters pending approval
fetchPendingPoster(uint256).return: address of the approved poster at the given idx

fetchPendingPosterNum().details: Allows admin to fetch the number of posters pending approval
fetchPendingPosterNum().return: length of array of pending posters

isAdmin(address).details: Verify is an addr is admin
isAdmin(address).return: Bool to indicate whether addr is admin

rejectPoster(address).details: Allows admin to reject job posters who request access

reqAccessFromAdmin(address).details: Allows job posters to req access from Admin
reqAccessFromAdmin(address).return: bool to indicate if request was successful

devdoc.title: AdminWindow
